title: Video Of A Mentally Ill Man Thrashed In Rajasthan Revived With False Claim
subtitle: The video is from Bhilwara, Rajasthan which is being falsely shared as an incident from India-Bangladesh border
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
"This video is from the India-Bangladesh Border" (In Hindi -"इस वीडीओ को पूरे हिन्दूसतान और दुनिया के कोने कोने तक किसी भी जरीये से पहुचाने मे अपना हक अदा करें।। मैंने कर दिया। और आप सोच भी नही सकते जी के आप कितना बड़ा काम कर रहे हो ये वीडियो भारत बंगला देश बार्डर के पास की है ।👇👇👇👇👇")

We were able to ascertain that the video is from Bhilwara, Rajasthan. The same video was viral in October 2019, with false claims that a person from the Sikh community was beaten by Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) workers and another false claim that Muslims beat an old man for chanting Bharat Mata Ki Jai. Local police told BOOM at the time that there was no political or communal angle in the incident and five people had been arrested for the same.
